name: Dr. Arvind Krishnamurthy
title: Director of Quantum Research
bio: Dr. Krishnamurthy leads quantum research initiatives at IBM India and has 15+ years of experience in quantum computing research.

name: Prof. Sanchita Das
title: Professor of Physics
bio: Prof. Das is a renowned quantum information theorist with expertise in quantum cryptography and foundational aspects of quantum mechanics.

name: Ravi Sharma
title: Senior Quantum Engineer
bio: Ravi is a senior engineer working on quantum software optimization and has contributed to major quantum computing frameworks.

name: Dr. Neha Kulkarni

bio: Dr. Kulkarni specializes in quantum applications for chemistry and optimization, bridging theory and practical implementation.
